verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:11
verses.text: And ye came near and stood under the mountain; and the mountain burned with fire unto the midst of heaven, with darkness, clouds, and thick darkness.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:12
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto you out of the midst of the fire: ye heard the voice of the words, but saw no similitude; only ye heard a voice.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:13
verses.text: And he declared unto you his covenant, which he commanded you to perform, even ten commandments; and he wrote them upon two tables of stone.
